about_the_game:
White Wolf - Darkside Chronicles DLC

(All Controller Supported Rumble Steam Deck & PC - PC Only Keyboard & Mouse - Steam Deck Only Touch Screen + Controller Rumble)

Enter Darkside of "White Wolf" story how evil got trapped in chest in snow cave. When you opened chest you felled into magic dream realm spell to enter "White Wolf" mind to corrupt into "Dark Wolf. Let evil adventure begin!

* Play as "Dark Wolf" Character floats on rock with magic powers, jumping, blasting with evil ball energy at enemies, picking up to Float items & throw or shield.

* Explore 6 temples each level with fighting enemies though level by collecting wolf coin to complete each level to advance.

* Unsolved the Darkside Chronicles to play next game White Wolf - Treasure Hunter understand story of darkside.
